subject: Pro x ultra
description_text:
Hola!!!!

Los pedales pro x ultra, est√° incluido la barra delantera de led? O es
aparte comprando la base.

Gracias

conversations.body_text: Hi Jesus Jimenez,     The baseplate includes the led strip module; if the base is not purchased, it is not included, as it requires installation onto the baseplate .

Se puede adquirir solo la barra delantera? Ya tengo una base que es
compatible con los pedales.

El jue., 4 dic. 2025 13:38, support@simsonn.com
Hi Jesus Jimenez,      You may purchase this product and request to replace it with LED strips.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/carbon-fiber-heel-plate-1
